description: Page view event is emitted once on home page load through GTM dataLayer.
steps: Start the app in development mode.
Open the home page in a browser with devtools.
Inspect dataLayer entries after first render.
Verify exactly one page_view event for initial load.

description: Page view event includes canonical route path and page title.
steps: Load home page.
Capture page_view payload from dataLayer.
Validate route and title fields are present and non-empty.

description: Navigation from home page to book page emits a new page_view event.
steps: Open home page.
Navigate to /book from UI.
Inspect dataLayer push history.
Verify second page_view event contains /book path.

description: No duplicate page_view event is emitted on hydration for single route load.
steps: Open home page with network and console logs enabled.
Count page_view pushes in dataLayer.
Confirm only one event exists before user interaction.

description: Booking funnel start event is fired when user begins booking interaction.
steps: Open booking flow page.
Trigger first actionable booking step from UI.
Inspect dataLayer event stream.
Verify booking_funnel_start event is present.

description: Booking submit event includes required payload fields without undefined values.
steps: Complete booking form with valid test input.
Submit booking form.
Capture booking_submit payload from dataLayer.
Validate required keys exist and are not undefined.

description: Deposit page CTA click emits conversion-intent tracking event.
steps: Open /deposit page.
Click primary deposit CTA.
Verify matching CTA click event in dataLayer.

description: Contact form submission emits lead_submit event and includes channel metadata.
steps: Open contact page.
Fill required fields with test data.
Submit form.
Verify lead_submit event includes source/channel fields.

description: Google Places selection emits location_selected event with place identifier.
steps: Open booking flow where address autocomplete is available.
Select one autocomplete result.
Validate location_selected event payload has place_id.

description: Menu package selection emits package_selected event with package name and price tier.
steps: Open menu or estimate flow.
Choose a package option.
Verify package_selected event contains package metadata.

description: Promo banner click emits promotion_click event with campaign identifier.
steps: Load page containing promotion banner.
Click promotion banner CTA.
Inspect dataLayer event payload for campaign id.

description: Instagram video interaction emits social_video_engagement event.
steps: Open section with Instagram videos.
Trigger interaction (open modal or play).
Verify social_video_engagement event appears in dataLayer.

description: Phone click from floating contact buttons emits phone_click event.
steps: Open a page containing floating contact buttons.
Click call button.
Confirm phone_click event was emitted.

description: SMS click from floating contact buttons emits sms_click event.
steps: Open a page containing floating contact buttons.
Click SMS button.
Confirm sms_click event was emitted.

description: Quote estimation completion emits estimate_completed event with total estimate value.
steps: Go through estimation steps with valid selections.
Reach completion screen.
Verify estimate_completed event with numeric estimate value.

description: Tracking utility is resilient when GTM is unavailable and does not crash UI.
steps: Load app without GTM script or with blocked GTM network calls.
Interact with at least two tracked CTAs.
Confirm no runtime exception is thrown and UI remains functional.

description: No visual regressions introduced by tracking bootstrap component in layout.
steps: Load home page and booking page.
Take screenshots for baseline comparison.
Verify no layout shift or flicker caused by tracking bootstrap.

description: Core pages remain interactive and responsive after tracking instrumentation is enabled.
steps: Open home, book, and contact pages.
Interact with major controls on desktop and mobile viewport.
Verify there is no delayed click response from tracking hooks.

description: Route changes via browser back/forward produce consistent page_view events.
steps: Navigate across at least three routes.
Use browser back then forward.
Verify page_view events map correctly to active route each time.

description: Tracking event naming conventions are consistent and documented.
steps: List all event names emitted by core flows.
Compare against naming convention (snake_case and domain prefix where required).
Document mismatches in codex-progress.md.

description: Fix Contact page intent so customer inquiries are separated from partner recruitment.
steps: Create a customer-facing Contact page with Phone, WhatsApp, SMS, and a short form.
Rename the current partner recruitment page to Partner Opportunities and move it to footer navigation.
Verify users who click Contact can immediately request a booking or ask a question.
Verify partner recruitment no longer interrupts normal customer flow.

description: Launch a one-page Quote Builder MVP so users can get pricing context before contacting you.
steps: Collect 4+1 inputs in under 30 seconds: Date, Zip/City, Adults/Kids, Tableware rental (default selected), Budget (optional).
Show instant estimate range with minimum-spend logic, travel fee range, and upgrade options (steak/shrimp/lobster).
Provide primary actions: one-click SMS, one-click Call, and one-click Email with auto-filled lead details.
Provide a secondary action to place deposit or request manual confirmation.
Add event tracking for quote_started, quote_completed, and contact clicks.
Verify users can complete the core quote flow on a single page.
Verify contact templates are prefilled with captured quote parameters.
Verify quote completion rate and post-quote contact rate are measurable.

description: Unify and strengthen the primary CTA so users always know the next action.
steps: Standardize primary CTA copy across the site to Book Now or Get Instant Quote.
Add a mobile sticky CTA bar with Call, WhatsApp, and Book actions.
Verify every key page has one clear primary CTA above the fold and near page end.
Verify mobile users can reach booking in one tap from all core pages.

description: Fix inconsistent service-area copy to improve trust and clarity.
steps: Audit all pages for city/state copy mismatches and fix inconsistencies.
Create or refine city-specific landing pages and add internal links.
Verify service-area statements are consistent and factually correct site-wide.
Verify users can clearly understand where services are available.

description: Improve price transparency to reduce hesitation before contact.
steps: Add total-price example cards for common party sizes (e.g., 10/15/20 guests).
Clearly explain taxes, travel, equipment, and add-on costs.
Verify users can understand expected total cost within 30 seconds.
Verify pricing-clarity objections decrease in inbound messages.

description: Upgrade FAQ from a list of questions into a conversion objection-handling module.
steps: Expand the top three high-frequency objections by default.
Repeat critical policy answers on the Book page (cancellation, weather, arrival timing, allergies).
Verify users can see key answers without extra clicks.
Verify booking pages cover major objections before contact.

description: Strengthen social-proof authenticity with verifiable external evidence.
steps: Add a clickable Google Reviews widget or a View all reviews link.
Add real event video snippets with customer name/city tags where possible.
Verify users can open third-party review sources directly.
Verify each core landing page shows at least three verifiable social-proof elements.
waived_reason: Stakeholder-approved skip: no external Google Reviews/video proof assets available in current cycle.

description: Build a conversion tracking and A/B testing baseline for continuous CRO iteration.
steps: Track CTA clicks, form submits, WhatsApp clicks, and phone clicks.
Run two initial A/B tests: hero headline and primary CTA copy.
Verify weekly funnel reporting is available (visit -> click -> submit -> close).
Verify at least one test result is produced each month.

description: Add a chef-led brand story section to reduce template feel and improve trust.
steps: Add a Why Real Hibachi story block near the top of the homepage.
Include chef profile, years of experience, event count, and brand promise.
Optionally add a 30-60 second intro video.
Verify users can see brand story within the first three scrolls.
Verify the section includes a clear conversion CTA.

description: Add a real-time booking notification pop-up to increase urgency and confidence.
steps: Show a small bottom-right social-proof toast with recent booking examples.
Rotate every 20-40 seconds and allow users to dismiss it.
Ensure mobile rendering does not block core CTA buttons.
Verify popup does not interfere with form inputs or navigation.
Verify dismissed popup stays hidden for the current session.

description: Highlight Zero Mess Guarantee to address top in-home service anxiety.
steps: Add high-contrast copy in Show Up Package: Zero Mess, We Clean Up Everything.
Repeat the cleanliness guarantee on FAQ and Book pages.
Optionally add before/after cleanup visuals.
Verify guarantee message is visible on home and booking pages.
Verify guarantee is visible above the fold on mobile where practical.

description: Enable one-click contact channels with auto-filled templates to improve lead quality.
steps: Respect dependency on CRO-QUOTE-001.
Prefill SMS message with date, location, guest count, rental need, and estimate range.
Provide a suggested call script aligned to quote details.
Prefill email subject and body with captured lead parameters.
Verify SMS, Call, and Email all carry structured quote context.
Verify message templates can be configured without code changes.

description: Implement Quote Builder funnel analytics for measurable ROI optimization.
steps: Track quote_started, quote_completed, and SMS/Call/Email click events.
Segment funnel performance by city, rental selection, and add-on choices.
Verify weekly exportable funnel reports are available.
Verify top-performing traffic sources can be identified reliably.

description: 新增 AI Agent 服务平台演进规格文件，覆盖 Prompt/Workflow/Tool/RAG/Eval 的目标与验收标准。
steps: 创建 ai-agent-platform-evolution-spec.xml，定义目标、架构模块、领域模型与需求分级。
在规格中明确客服、报价、预约、销售跟进链路与 Tool Calling、人工接管策略。
在规格中定义交付阶段、北极星指标与验收标准，确保可执行与可验证。
验证 spec 文件存在且包含关键章节（platformModules、functionalRequirements、acceptanceCriteria）。

description: Quote Builder超宽屏下Instant Estimate Range区域需保证三种联系方式按钮完整展示。
steps: 在/quote页面为右侧Instant Estimate Range区域分配更大宽度，避免按钮区域被压缩。
将联系方式按钮布局调整为响应式（中屏2列，超宽屏3列）。
保证Email按钮文本可换行展示，不出现超出按钮边界。
验证关键样式类存在并通过静态质量门禁。

description: Create explicit quote variant routes so Quote A and Quote B can run as separate pages.
steps: Expose two dedicated routes: /quoteA and /quoteB.
Keep legacy /quote route functional by redirecting to the default variant.
Update primary site quote CTAs to the default experiment variant route.
Verify build output includes /quoteA and /quoteB route entries.

description: Variant B urgency module includes a direct deposit lock CTA.
steps: Show urgency copy in Quote B after date and location are selected.
Include explicit text prompting users to pay deposit to lock the slot.
Add a Pay Deposit to Lock button inside the urgency block.
Verify button emits tracking intent and navigates to /deposit.

description: Align deposit page details with Instant Quote input and estimate range.
steps: Collect Customer Name and Event Time on Quote flow before deposit lock action.
Pass quote context (name/date/time/location/guest counts/estimate range) to /deposit.
Render deposit page Total Estimate using Instant Quote low/high range when source is quote flow.
Verify deposit lock CTA is disabled until required quote fields are filled.

description: Quote Event Time input uses fixed common time slots instead of free-form time entry.
steps: Replace free-form Event Time input with dropdown selection.
Provide fixed options: 16:00, 19:00, 12:00, 14:00.
Keep Event Time required for deposit lock CTA enablement.
Verify static quality gates pass after the input type change.

description: Tableware Rental helper copy includes limited free canopy note.
steps: Update the Tableware Rental label helper text on quote form.
Include wording indicating limited free canopy availability.
Ensure copy change does not break form interaction.
Verify static quality gates pass.

description: Add a default-on rainy day 10'x10' tent option under tableware in Quote flow.
steps: Add a 10'x10' tent checkbox directly under the Tableware Rental option.
Default the tent checkbox to checked for new quote sessions.
Include tent selection in quote summary/contact payload for downstream visibility.
Verify static quality gates pass.

description: Use an icon-based tooltip trigger for tableware details instead of plain question-mark text.
steps: Keep the main label concise as Include tableware rental.
Use a small icon button for detail disclosure.
Show included items and per-person price inside tooltip content.
Verify lint/build quality gates pass.

description: Enhance Instant Estimate Range with a visual weather snapshot card (sunset/rain/temp).
steps: Add a weather card in the right-side Instant Estimate Range panel when date and location are selected.
Display sunset time, rain status/chance, and temperature using icons and styled tiles (not plain text list).
Keep the weather block visually distinct with gradient card styling.
Verify lint/build quality gates pass after UI update.

description: Back weather snapshot card with live weather API data for selected date and location.
steps: Add server API endpoint to resolve location and fetch event-day weather metrics (sunset/rain/temp).
Call the weather API from quote client when date and location are selected.
Render weather snapshot card using live response data with graceful fallback on API errors.
Verify static quality gates pass and new /api/quote/weather route compiles.

description: Weather snapshot should support event-time specific forecast values (not only daily aggregates).
steps: Accept eventTime in /api/quote/weather and resolve nearest hourly forecast point.
Return event-time label plus temperature/rain values for that specific time.
Use selected Event Time in quote client weather request and update weather card copy to indicate time-specific values.
Verify lint/build gates pass after API and UI updates.

description: Add Book Online CTA in Instant Estimate actions to route users directly into deposit flow.
steps: Add a Book Online action button in the quote action button group.
Require required fields (name/date/time/location) before enabling direct deposit routing.
Route click directly to /deposit with quote context query parameters.
Verify lint/build quality gates pass.
